comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Actually, I talked to iSean yesterday and he tells me he's looking for a bike w/ _no_ gears. This represents the ultimate middle finger to old-school trogs like Bailey and me who simply haven't the suds to push 52/10's up Super Flag. I'm not quite sure what his new ride will like, but the Seanster tells me it helps to picture a paper clip on wheels. Something at once brutally minimal _and_ wholly dysfunctional. Sounds a lot like my cousin Ernie. DU

comments.author: amanda
comments.body: heard MCSpandx is in concert in Leadville this weekend, are you guys going?? HA!!!
